sourcesContent:
export const themes = {
  common: {
    fontFamily:
    "Roboto, -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Oxygen, Ubuntu, Cantarell, 'Open Sans', 'Helvetica Neue', sans-serif",
    menuBorder: '#232F34',
    menuBg: '#344955',
    menuColor: '#4A6572',
    menuHover: '#F9AA33',
    headerBg: 'linear-gradient(45deg, #5c0434, #000000d6)',
    white: '#FFF',
    black: '#000',

  },
  mobile: '568px',
  light: {
    type: 'light',
    // bgColor: 'rgb(250, 250, 252)',
    bgColor: '#',
    error: '#b00020',
    boxBg: 'rgba(50, 150, 252, 0.8)',
    // color: '#3E4C59',
    color: '#121212',
    searchBgColor: '#E4E7EB',
    boxShadow: '0.8rem 0.8rem 1.5rem gray',
    categoryColor: '#999',
    categoryHoverColor: '#333',
    textColor: '#ED3833',
    test: 'linear-gradient(45deg, #cc0404, #000000d6)',
    btnBg: '#344955',
    btnColor: '#fff',
    statColor: '#1A74D6',
    blueTheme: '#6200EE',
    lightColor: '#767676',
    dark: '#121212'
  },
  dark: {
    primaryColor: '#010101',
    surface: '',
    error: '#CF6679',
    bgColor: '#121212',
    primaryText: 'hsl(207, 0%, 87%)',
    mediumText: 'hsl(207, 0%, 60%)',
    disabledText: 'hsl(207, 0%, 38%)',
    type: 'dark',
    color: '#E4E7EB',
    searchBgColor: '#E4E7EB',
    boxShadow: '0.4rem 0.4rem 1.5rem #11111111',
    categoryColor: '#CBD2D9',
    categoryHoverColor: '#9AA5B1',
    textColor: '#ED3833',
    test: 'linear-gradient(45deg, #cc0404, #000000d6)',
    btnBg: '#344955',
    btnColor: '#fff',
    statColor: '#1A74D6',
    lightColor: '#919695',
    dark: '#121212'
  },
}
